name: Source Data Model

tables.name: Policy
tables.description: Stores details for issued insurance policies.

fields.name: Policy Id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the insurance policy.

fields.name: Cust Id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the customer associated with the policy.

fields.name: Product Code
fields.description: Code representing the insurance product.

fields.name: Policy Type
fields.description: Type of insurance policy issued.

fields.name: Pol Status
fields.description: Current status of the policy (e.g., active, canceled).

fields.name: Agent Id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the agent who sold the policy.

tables.name: Policy Term
tables.description: Table containing policy and term details for insurance policies.

fields.name: Policy Id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the insurance policy.

fields.name: Term Id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the term associated with the policy.

fields.name: Cust Id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the customer associated with the policy.

fields.name: Term Number
fields.description: Number indicating the term sequence within a policy.

fields.name: Product Code
fields.description: Code representing the insurance product.

fields.name: Effective date
fields.description: Date from which the policy term becomes effective.

fields.name: Expiry date
fields.description: Date on which the policy term expires.

fields.name: Issue Date
fields.description: Date on which the insurance policy was issued.

fields.name: Policy Type
fields.description: Type of insurance policy (e.g., life, health, auto).

fields.name: Pol Status
fields.description: Current status of the policy term (e.g., Active, Expired, Renewed).

fields.name: Renewal Date
fields.description: Date on which the policy term was renewed, if applicable.

fields.name: Agent Id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the insurance agent managing the policy.

tables.name: Claim Header
tables.description: Contains high-level information about insurance claims

fields.name: Claim Id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the claim

fields.name: Policy Id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the associated policy

fields.name: Term Id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the policy term

fields.name: Loss Date
fields.description: Date when the loss occurred

fields.name: Registered Date
fields.description: Date when the claim was registered

fields.name: Loss type
fields.description: Type of loss reported in the claim

fields.name: Claim Status
fields.description: Current status of the claim (e.g., Open, Closed)

fields.name: Loss location
fields.description: Location where the loss occurred

fields.name: Claimant ID
fields.description: Unique identifier for the claimant

relationships:
[
  {
    "fromTable": "Policy",
    "fromField": [
      "Policy Id",
      "Cust Id",
      "Product Code",
      "Policy Type",
      "Pol Status",
      "Agent Id"
    ],
    "toTable": "Policy Term",
    "toField": [
      "Policy Id",
      "Cust Id",
      "Product Code",
      "Policy Type",
      "Pol Status",
      "Agent Id"
    ],
    "type": "one-to-many",
    "description": "Relationship between Policy and Policy Term with various fields."
  },
  {
    "fromTable": "Policy Term",
    "fromField": ["Policy Id", "Term Id"],
    "toTable": "Claim Header",
    "toField": ["Policy Id", "Term Id"],
    "type": "one-to-many",
    "description": "A single policy term can be linked to multiple claims."
  },
  {
    "fromTable": "Policy Term",
    "fromField": ["Cust Id"],
    "toTable": "Claim Header",
    "toField": ["Claimant ID"],
    "type": "one-to-many",
    "description": "A claimant (customer) can register multiple claims for one or more policy terms."
  }
]
